body.p: All of our drone operators and drones are covered by insurance so you can fly us with peace of mind.
All of our drone operators are FAA licensed to operate sUAS systems under part 107.

entry.title: How much will it cost to clean my windows?

body.p: Generally we charge $5 per window and have a flat $100 fee for set up. However the exact price will vary from job to job. Call us and we will give you a free estimate!
